sentences.english: Traveling companions not only enrich the experience of travel, but also make it safer.
sentences.chinese: 遊伴不僅豐富旅遊閱歷，也會讓遊程更安全。

sentences.english: And come with your playfellows into the street.
sentences.chinese: 而且進入街道之內帶你的遊伴來。

sentences.english: When you see or experience something new you can share it with your travel companion.
sentences.chinese: 看到或經濟新事物時你會與遊伴一起分享。
